name: MEC Trail 30 Pack - Unisex
description:
Leave no layer behind. This rugged daypack won't impose limits on where you go or what you take. There's room for trail essentials plus few backcountry luxuries, plus a hydration reservoir, and your hiking poles.Construction combines 450 and 200-denier recycled polyester.Clamshell zipper with oversized glove-friendly pull loops.YKK® reversed coil zipper closes smoothly on main and accessory pockets.Shoulder straps in 2-layer foam/mesh fit comfortably.Adjustable sternum strap takes the tension off your shoulders.Textured backsheet with mesh and foam construction sits comfortably on your back.Top accessory pocket with a key clip keeps personal items secure.2 stretch mesh side pockets with elastic edge to hold bottles securely.10mm bar-tacked webbing lets you clip on a caribiner.Webbing loops for poles or ice axes.Hydration sleeve with hanger and elastic edge.Buckled compression straps reduce pack volume.Removable adjustable waist belt connects with simple loop.Recco® reflector is detectable by ski patrols and search and rescue teams.

        Sustainability
